titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, Department of Economics, Honors Theses
Stanford University, Department of Economics, Honors Theses
titlestmt.author: Stanford University Archives staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Stanford University, Department of Economics, honors theses
did.abstract: Honors theses written by undergraduate students in the Stanford University Department of Economics.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the Stanford University Archives by the Department of Economics in several accessions. Additional theses were transferred by the Hume Writing Center in 2011.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. No photocopies may be made.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creator for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Transmission or reproduction of materials requires the written permission of the copyright owner.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stanford University, Department of Economics, Honors Theses (SC4-3863). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of honors theses written by undergraduate students in the Stanford University Department of Economics.
